fulltext:
Hoang Tran 
● 5 years of software development experience 
● Experience in Object Oriented Programming 
● Basic knowledge about Agile Development process such as SCRUM 
● Basic knowledge about other OOP languages such as C++, PHP, Ruby on Rails 
● Basic knowledge about networking 
TECHNOLOGY XP 
● Programming language: 
○ Java 
■ J2EE, Web Service 
■ JSP, Servlet, GWT 
■ Junit 
■ Hadoop, Hive, Spark 
■ Multithreading 
○ C/C++, PHP, Ruby on Rails 
● IDE tools: Eclipse, Intellij 
● Application/Web servers: Apache Tomcat 
● Database: MSSQL, Postgresql, MySQL, Sybase  
● Platform: Windows, Linux 
● Configuration management tools: Subversion, Git  
● Bug management tool: JIRA 
● Build tools: Ant, Maven 
WORK EXPERIENCE 
Senior Software Engineer - Vietnam 
At Alipay (Alibaba) Vietnam company 
2015 – PRESENT 
Software Engineer Developer – Vietnam 
At TMA Solutions company 
2013 - 2015 
PROJECTS 
Project 1: Payment (2018 – Present) 
● Description: In this project, we design workflow and make configuration to integrate 
multiple services to process customer payment transaction 
● Position: Senior Software Developer 
● Technologies: 
− Java, Groovy, Velocity 
− Distributed Cache, Message Broker  
− jBPM, MicroServices 
− Dynamic Container ( OSGi) 
Project 2: eWorkflow (2017 – 2018) 
● Description: this is about all POC projects connecting BPM (Business Process 
Management) with ECM (Enterprise Content Management) to provide an enterprise 
solution 
● Position: Senior Software Developer 
● Technologies: 
− Camunda, Activiti, SalesForce 
− Alfresco, CMIS 
− Spring Boot (Restful API) 
− Angular2 
− AWS, Jenkins  
− Docker, Shell Scripts  
− Openshift, Kubernetes 
Project 3: DMP (2016 – 2017) 
● Description: Create report where all information related to game traffic is calculated 
and summarized to help marketing team make decision easily. 
● Position: Senior Software Developer 
● Technologies: 
− MySQL 
− BigData, Hadoop, Hive, Spark.  
− Java (OOP, Multihreading,...)  
− Ant 
− Jquery, Javascript, HTML, CSS 
Project 4: Mornitoring System (Jun 2015 – 2016) 
● Description: Involved in building up a website which helps monitor production of the 
company. 
● Position: Senior Software Developer 
● Technologies: 
− Postgres SQL 
− Spring MVC, Spring Core, Spring Security. 
− Hibernate ORM 
− Jquery, Javascript, HTML, CSS 
Project 5: GBST – Composer Back Office (Sep 2014 – Jun 2015) 
● Description: Developing Composer Back Office System. 
● Position: Software Developer 
● Technologies: 
− Power Builder 
− SQL Server 
− Sybase SQL 
− Management tool : Mashups 
Project 6: GBST – Front Office (Jun 2014 – Sep 2014) 
● Description: Developing Front Office System. 
● Position: Software Developer 
● Technologies: 
− Java Hibernate, Spring 
− GWT 
− PostgreSQL 
Project 7: MAINPAC EAM (Feb 2014 – Jun 2014) 
● Description: this is a best of breed, easy-to-use maintenance and asset management 
system that is both customizable and scalable to enable any organization to improve 
their Return on Assets (ROA), maximize Operational Effectiveness and optimize 
maintenance and operations costs. 
● Position: Software Developer 
● Technologies: 
− C# 
− WSO2 
− WCF Web Service 
Project 8: Human Resources Management System (Aug 2013 – Feb 2014) 
● Description: This is a web-based system which offers stand- alone personnel tracking, 
applicant tracking, recruiting, performance reviews, goal management, absence 
management. 
● Position: Software Developer 
● Technologies: 
− Java 
− PostgreSQL. 
− JPA, Hibernate. 
− Spring (Spring Core, Spring Integration). 
− JUnit, Mockito. 
EDUCATION & TRAINING 
2009 – 2013 
Bachelor Degree in Computer Science 
Ho Chi Minh University of Technology 
LANGUAGES 
Vietnamese (Native)  
English (Upper-intermediate)
